mapper.insert: insert into t_user(username, password, add_time, update_time) values( #{username, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.select:
select
from t_user where username=#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
